Text: I have been looking everywhere for this. Thanks so much.
I can't get the video to play correctly. The audio is good quality though.

The quality is just as good as the original source, which is good enough. However, mkvgod forgot to re-encode and mux the audio for one of the episodes. I completely forget which episode it was though.

Also, it's a shame that only half of the episodes in season 2 are widescreen and the others are 4:3.

Still worth a download as this show is hard to find and there aren't any dvdrips of this show anywhere.

@pjsmoke

That would be season 2 episode 11 - The past is prologue I'm currently up to that episode and have no idea what i can do to resolve the issue.

Download that episode from bitsnoop. Just search Jerimiah season 2.

You can either re-encode it or if you don't know how to do that download "MKVmerge" and add that audio to the mkvgod video. It should be in syc with the video.
Tick the video tab on bitsnoop and search Jerimiah season 2.

Thanks for the info, I had never heard of bitsnoop before, I'll download that 1 episode from there and just watch that version, I'm not a big fan of MKV's, I only downloaded this torrent because it was the only Jeremiah torrent I could find :D
